about_the_game:
Step into the ancient realm of warriors in this open-world wuxia RPG. Whether you journey through the lands solo or rise as the master of your own sect, the paths of ‘Turn of Destiny’ and ‘Sandbox Mode’ await your legend.

Dynamic Evolution

We hope to simulate a vivid, free Jianghu, compatible with both “artificial open world” and “dynamic rules evolution”, players can have a different game experience every time they start.

High Freedom

You can choose your own way of playing in the Jianghu or open the door to set up your own school, cultivate and refine your martial arts or lead your disciples to unify the jungle.

Real-time combat system, rich matching system

There are more than 100 kinds of martial arts, stunts and rich talent and props system in the game, and the battle operation adopts real-time system. Reasonable collocation and operation is the key to your victory!

Jianghu Launcher

Ontology is MOD sample - the default script provided by the game is also a comprehensive demonstration of the game's MOD development capabilities.
We hope to work with the Creative Workshop community to gradually iterate and create a unique experience with strong expansion capabilities of the “Jianghu Launcher”.
